text.0: #Arch9090. Wow!  Who thought of this now?? First disinfectant, and now mouthwash is being touted as the miracle cure for Covid-19. Here's  @GhanaFact putting a stop to #Fakenews. https://t.co/JbIM3jOh73
text.1:
The election period is heated and arguments on who start the Free Senior High School programme is one. Here's a fact check report by Ghana's independent and reliable fact checking platform @ghana_fact

https://t.co/sPxlGTf1Mo
